Container.Name: amvd
Container.Description: Automated Music Video Downloader :: This script will automatically download music videos for your Lidarr artist library
Container.Overview: Automated Music Video Downloader :: This script will automatically download music videos for your Lidarr artist library

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: Lidarr Url
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Config.Name: Lidarr API Key
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Config.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

Config.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10

Config.Name: Music Videos Country Code
Config.Description: Set the country code for preferred video matching, uses Musicbrainz Country Codes, lowercase only.

Config.Name: Music Videos Require Match
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Only keep videos that could be matched to a Musicbrainz music track.

Config.Name: Music Videos Format
Config.Description: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Config.Name: Music Videos Subtitle Langauge
Config.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Config.Name: Music Videos Filter Match
Config.Description: This will filter out videos Matching MusicBrainz secondary release type and album disambiguation (single word only)
